====Checkout latest release====
{{{
# with zend framework
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ phpQuery
# without zend framework
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ phpQuery --ignore-externals
}}}
====Checkout developer branch====
{{{
# with zend framework
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/branches/dev/ phpQuery-dev
# without zend framework
svn checkout http://phpquery.googlecode.com/svn/branches/dev/ phpQuery-dev --ignore-externals
}}}
You may want to checkout phpQuery without Zend Framework, as only small part of framework is used. After checkout, get needed files from [http://code.google.com/p/phpquery/downloads/list release packages].

SVN changelog is available thou [http://code.google.com/p/phpquery/source/list Web interface] and [http://code.google.com/feeds/p/phpquery/svnchanges/basic RSS].

Get SVN for windows from [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN].
